page.title: 19Our School in the 80's
page.content: Castle Cary Primary School in 1984/85 has a teaching staff of 5 full-time and 1 part-time members.The number of children on roll is approximately 140. The original school buildings are still in use and 3 wooden classrooms have been added. The school has its own swimming pool and negotiations are under way for land to be purchased adjacent to the school for a playing field. Both the television ,radio and more recently the computer are used to aid teaching in the classroom. At present a library/resource area is being created and it is hoped that the school will continue to expand and change with the times.
